Detailed Description

Tab dialog for the display options.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OptDisplayDlgImpl::OptDisplayDlgImpl (  QWidget * parent = 0,
const char * name = 0,
bool modal = FALSE,
WFlags fl = 0
) 
 

Constructs a OptDisplayDlgImpl which is a child of 'parent', with the name 'name' and widget flags set to 'f'.

The dialog will by default be modeless, unless you set 'modal' to TRUE to construct a modal dialog.
